name: Goblin Conqueror
description:
"Goblin Conqueror" is an RPG game produced by BanameiR and published by Hanabi games.


Kanami, a former Dragon Slayer who lost her job due to the extinction of dragons. Now, she has embraced her new job as a Monster Hunter, wholeheartedly committed to vanquishing goblins.
Her peer, Uzuki, is a talented and elite Monster Hunter. Despite their similar ages, the relationship between Kanami and Uzuki has always been quite strained.
Though they're no longer threatened by dragons, the danger posed by goblins remains significant, and they must eliminate them to protect their city. Embark on this thrilling journey and witness how Kanami and Uzuki overcome their differences and grow together in their quest to eliminate the goblin threat!

This game is a role-playing game that takes players on an epic journey through a richly detailed world filled with danger, mystery, and enchantment.






  • Jrpg
  • Captivating story
  • Term rock-paper-scissors based fights
